name: CUBI (Apafey)
description:
Build your own electronic machines!

Build IC and reuse it in the machine like never before in any game!

  • Drag and drop objects.
  • Use "R" to rotate, "DEL" to delete objects.
  • "F" or double click to "use" switch: it can be turned on/off
  • Match green and yellow joiners together!
  • Use "POWER" battery to make things work!

This is the first showcase of the concept.

MAAAANY new objects will come soon, e.g. logic gates.

Mobile version is coming soon.

Waiting for your suggestions, comments, ideas!

"Save" is not available in browser version.

Have fun with this game! :)
